scripts.copy-ready-src: cp lib/background.js lib/contentScript.js lib/launcher.js src/launcher.html src/manifest.json src/mermaid.css src/panel.html src/128.png dist/
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && npm install && npm run lib && npm run dist-graphSerializer && npm run dist-panel && npm run copy-ready-src && npm run zip
